${ModID}:ValorForm.NAME: Valor
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, every attack played draws #b1 card. NL Costs #b4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs #b2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:WisdomForm.NAME: Wisdom
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, whenever you play a card gain 2 #yBlock. NL Costs #b4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs #b2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:MasterForm.NAME: Wisdom
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, whenever you play a card, gain #b2 #yBlock. If the card played is an attack, draw #b1 card. NL Costs #b8 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs #b4 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.
